programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.desc: Double bill. The team tries to help when Thera fears a trip to the dentist. Then, the team awesome-ises Lars' voice, making it so smooth and seductive that no one can resist him.(n)

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: House of 1000 Boogers/Attack of the Killer Potatoes.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy crashes Bash's party and discovers it is a plot to unmask the Ninja. Then, Randy learns his enemy's science project is meant to destroy the ninja.(n)

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.sub-title: The Epic Quest of Unfathomable Difficulty/The Void.
programme.desc: Double bill. Wander makes Sylvia go on an epic quest to return a lost sock. Then, Wander and Sylvia enter a white void where anything is possible.(n)

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Trying to help Spencer get an authentic-sounding scream to use in one of his movies, Billy scares Mallory so badly that she decides to move far away. Then, Spencer wants to buy a piece of horror movie memorabilia, but does not have any money.(n)

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. When Spencer shoots a Jaws-style movie in his pool, Billy's ectoplasm turns the film's harmless goldfish star into a fearsome aquatic monster. Then, Spencer's sister, Jessica develops a crush on Kleet, and the bully sees an opportunity to spend time at Spencer's house tormenting him.(n)

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Phoebe is chosen to appear on talent show Sing Your Way to Stardom, and the whole town tunes in to watch her efforts. Then, Coop and Dennis join a local rocket club and appear to be doing really well, but Kat has evil planets for their projects.(n)

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat's surly teenage son Junior arrives in a space pod having run away from home. As Junior struts around, threatening to blow Kat's cover, Coop helps Kat send him back. Dad accidentally swaps some of Kat's weapons for other stuff, so Coop tries to get them back.(n)

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Randy and Howard accidentally stumble back in time and must help the original Ninja battle the Sorcerer.(n)

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Welcome Back Catfish!/All the Juice That's Fish to Swim.
programme.desc: Double bill. Catfish Booray returns to Norrisville as a substitute teacher under the Sorcerer's control. Then, a fad for frozen soup hits the school, and as a result Howard suffers a transformation.(n)

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. The half-boy, half-oyster dresses as a super-hero to change his friends' dislike of molluscs. Then, Boyster uses yoghurt to make Alicia a pearl necklace, but it goes wrong and turns her bright blue.(n)

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Part one of two. After meeting the ghost of Malakai, first king of Kinkow, Brady and Boomer must find his evil twin before he destroys the island, by journeying to the Dark Side.(n)

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Part two of two. The first king's evil twin Kalakai teams up with Lanny and puts Brady under a spell. Now turned evil, Brady plots to get Boomer's king ring and see Kalakai crowned.(n)

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas and Ferb try to help Candace find her doll when it is accidentally sold in a garage sale.(n)

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The mall holds a fashion show, and the boys become designers with the help of Isabella and the girls.(n)

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Isabella has her tonsils removed and gets to eat lots of ice-cream, so the boys decide to make her a massive sundae.(n)

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys are told about a mysterious pirate named Badbeard while on a camping trip with their grandfather, and decide to set out on a swashbuckling adventure of their own.(n)

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: It's a Mud, Mud, Mud, Mud World.
programme.desc: Candace frets about her impending driving test, while the boys decide to build a monster truck.(n)

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Mabel's weird new boyfriend discloses some of the town's strange and uncanny secrets. Dipper finds a mysterious journal that hints at more of the town's hidden secrets.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: When the Guardians' search for the Cosmic Seed brings them to Earth, they are forced to confront Ronan, Nebula and Thanos.(n)

programme.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
programme.desc: An accident at an asteroid-based mining facility sends the rock hurtling toward the Sun, with crewman Ned Tedford still on-site. Alan and Kayo deploy Thunderbird Three for the rescue mission, but when a rogue solar flare knocks out their sensors, they are forced to find a way to alter the asteroid's trajectory so that it loops around the sun instead of plummeting to its ultra-hot surface. Animated adventure, with the voices of Rasmus Hardiker and Angel Coulby.(n)

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: Iron Man and Captain America disguise themselves as villains to infiltrate Red Skull's cabal. Their disagreements cause their cover to get blown, putting them in danger.(n)

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: Hulk crash lands on Earth with amnesia, remembering just one thing - the planet is doomed. The Avengers try to find out what has had this effect on the world's strongest man.(n)

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: Ultimate Spider-Man Vs The Sinister Six: The New Sinister Six - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. When Doc Ock learns the key that will retrieve Hydra Island is at Aunt May's house, Spider-Man has to protect his family and stop Doc Ock destroying the Triskelion.(n)

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: Ultimate Spider-Man Vs The Sinister Six: Agent Web.
programme.desc: When a battered Nova asks for help finding Nick Fury, Spider-Man tracks him to the dangerous ruins of an ancient city.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure based on the movie saga, following a band of heroes fighting back against the evil Galactic Empire.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars Freemaker Adventures
programme.desc: Rowan is captured by Graballa the Hutt, while attempting to retrieve a Kyber Saber Crystal from an asteroid field.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars Freemaker Adventures
programme.desc: When Zander takes a classic starfighter out for a joyride, he winds up in the clutches of Darth Vader.(n)

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.desc: Leo records Adam and Chase doing crazy bionic stunts in the lab on his new phone. The phone is about to be launched to the public, so they must wipe the incriminating evidence. programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Eve's attempts to help her sister KT pass for human are derailed when a miraculously recovered Katherine returns to Calimov. To Nick and Eve's horror, Katherine reveals her new range of childbots, which have been placed with local families. To prevent Katherine restoring KT to factory settings, Eve smuggles her out of Calimov and back to the Clarke house. But with Will and Lily insisting KT is returned to Calimov, Eve and her sister are forced to take matters into their own hands. The situation escalates when Katherine's childbots start to malfunction and it is KT who comes under suspicion, admitting she has no wish to pass as human. In order to make Eve prove she loves her sister as she is, KT wants Eve to reveal her own robot identity to the world. Trapped inside the house by the childbots, and with police and reporters gathering outside, the gang's worst fears have been realised. With Eve about to admit her secret to the world on live TV, can Will's nanobots save the day.(n)

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Rebecca and Nick are desperate to get to the bottom of Will's nanobot problem, so they take him into Calimov to run some tests. Whilst there, Nick insists that Katherine deactivate KT after the trouble she has caused, but Katherine has other ideas. Meanwhile Abe is disgruntled after Lily refuses to help him with his homework - she's more interested in her date with Cain. Maddy has her hands full preparing for the arrival of the new baby and tells Abe that it's time he grew up and took some responsibility for himself. A dejected Abe goes to Eve for help. As Eve completes his homework, Abe wonders aloud what's so special about babies - why do they get everyone's attention? After researching human child-rearing, Eve cites 'helplessness' as the main reason. Inspired, a scheming Abe fakes being ill to regain Maddy's attention, but his plan backfires. Suspecting Abe has appendicitis a concerned Maddy calls an ambulance! Once again Abe begs Eve for help and so Eve hacks the local traffic control system, gridlocking the roads and preventing the emergency services from getting through. The situation escalates when Maddy unexpectedly goes into labour. With the roads blocked, Abe must man-up and help his mum - while Eve goes for help. Across town Will crashes Lily's date revealing that Cain is a fully paid up member of anti-tech group PRICE. At Calimov, under Katherine's interrogation, KT reveals how Will ended the childbot siege using his nanobots. Katherine now has the leverage she needs to persuade Nick to keep KT online. At the Watsons', Eve and the gang return with help - to find Abe has successfully delivered his baby brother.(n)

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: For the umpteenth time Eve defeats her friends at gaming, singing a football chant in triumph. Eve explains how, in a matter of nanoseconds, her predictive software allows her to always choose the best possible course of action - hence the winning streak. But it cannot predict random events like lottery numbers, much to Abe's disappointment. Unknown to the gang, Cain waits outside with Michael Hoffman, the son of the late Lord Hoffman. In their attempts to find rogue robots, Cain pitches his theory that - given the multiple incidents involving robot activity at the Clarke house, plus Nick's prior history with Mary Douglas - this is a good place to start. When the doorbell rings, Eve answers to find Cain and Michael. Detecting their concealed EMPs, she slams the door on them. Spooked by this odd behaviour they break in, fearful that there may be another robot siege in progress. Once inside they learn that Eve is the robot and blast her with their EMPs - only for time to rewind. This has simply been a simulation in Eve's predictive software! Eve runs multiple simulations trying to find a way to stop Cain and Michael discovering her robot nature, but in each one her identity is exposed and Cain and Michael destroy her. With time running out, Eve recruits the Will and Lily simulations. Lily speculates that Eve is experiencing anxiety. She has become so human, that it has caused her predictive software to malfunction. Eve must disable the software and go it alone. Although Eve manages to evade discovery, neither she nor the gang realise that, while inside, Cain has bugged Nick's computer and is one step closer to the truth.(n)

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Mary resorts to extreme measures to head off the threat of Cain and PRICE, enlisting KT to help her temporarily transfer her consciousness to Eve. With KT AWOL from Calimov, a distracted Nick and Katherine welcome back Zac, who is helping them answer questions about how Mary was able to duplicate his personality. Excited about Zac's return, Eve suggests he join the gang's picnic that afternoon. To everyone's surprise Zac brings his new girlfriend, and for the first time Eve experiences jealousy. Spotting KT hovering nearby puts Eve on high alert. Operating under Protocol Zero, KT is Mary's automaton, and is primed to execute her mother's plan. Meanwhile, on Abe's misguided advice, Eve kisses Will in an attempt to make Zac jealous. For a moment, in robot communion, Will sees inside Eve's mind and then passes out. In the ensuing chaos, KT places a magnetic patch containing Mary's consciousness onto Eve. Inhabiting Eve's robot body, Mary begins to question Cain about PRICE. Separately, a revived Will tells Lily that when he kissed Eve he could see inside her systems. They theorise that this made her malfunction and fixate on the idea of jealousy - perhaps she is attempting to make Zac jealous by paying Cain so much attention? Little do they realise the truth. Later, Eve - still possessed by Mary - meets Cain in the park, where she interrogates him about PRICE's super-EMP. Mary decides that Cain must be terminated. Will intervenes in the nick of time, kissing Eve again. The disruption to her circuits forces Mary to relinquish control, but Will hears Mary's voice in Eve's mind. The gang are left with a burning question - could Mary be alive.(n)

programme.title: Show Me What You're Made Of
programme.desc: In episode five of Show Me What You're Made Of it's their last factory in Asia and our teens make their way to a fish canning plant on the Taiwanese coast. If they thought factory work would get any easier they were sadly wrong! Some of them find the fish smell overwhelming and are horrified to discover that one job is boxing up fish heads and guts after the choice meat has been canned. Can they face their worst nightmare? Will they be able to finally show their last factory boss that they can manage a day's work even they might not want to? As they finish up in Taiwan and fly home to the UK, will they be able to show their families that their incredible trip has really changed them? Show Me What You're Made Of is presented by Stacey Dooley.(n)

With a man down how will the other four cope with the very physical work involved? Their boss is the strictest one yet and he is not a man to be messed with. programme.title: Rank the Prank
programme.desc: RANK THE PRANK - pranking Hollywood style! Today our pesky pranksters are Dukafundis (Markus and Ellysa) and 'Very Intelligent Pranksters' (Evan and Ashazia) who team up with digital effects wizard Hassan Aziz and SFX specialists Marc Reichel and Andy Antoine to stage the biggest and best PUBLIC PRANKS on an unsuspecting public. The teams take over a bowling alley and it's all hands on deck to rig the hidden cameras and special effects required to bring our Pranksters' ideas to life. But which team will impress our prank-loving panel of 'Ranksters' to win the chance to stage a mind blowing MEGA PRANK on a 'target' of their choice? It's strike three for the targets when Markus and Ellysa's 'Haunted Alley' dukes it out with Evan and Ashazia's 'Hotdog Bowler'. Ranksters ... the choice is yours. For the winning team, the effectors have planned the ultimate MEGA PRANK at a car wash featuring a dirty car, a nervous driver and a meteor shower! Our 'target' may be able to avoid the meteor but will mom's car be able to do the same? One thing's for sure, this explosively entertaining mega prank strikes comedy gold!(n).(n)
